div.div:
npm: `npm run` command, fix eslint
Summary: - add various `npm run` subcommands for quality-of-life - change eslint config to make it work. - change GitHub CI to use the new commands - change lighthouse-ci URLs and alphabetize
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: Try these commands
- `npm run alint` - `npm run dbuild` - `npm run dserve` - `npm run lighthouse` - `npm run lint:eslint` - `npm run lint:test` - `npm run pcheck` - `npm run pwrite`
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D213

`npx prettier --write .`
Summary: Also:
- add prettier config and prettierignore - add quick `npm run` alias.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `npm run pcheck`, `npm run pwrite`
Reviewers: O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D212

gitalias: add more rules
Summary: - add !command in correct sections to prevent mistakes - alphabetize - `diffs` for `diff --staged` - `prod` to quick deploy to `prod` branch for some repos. - `staash` for `stash -a`
also: - add `max_line_length: 80` to editorconfig - autofix `TXT1` rule for `.arclint` - `rerere.autoUpdate = tru` for `gitconfig` - add prettier - fix nfty.yml - add `.yamllint` config
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: I think there isn't?
Reviewers: O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D211

static: add webfinger
Summary: Also set correct Content-Type
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `arc land`, deploy, browse `webfinger.json` page.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D208

docusaurus(robots.txt): add more rules
Summary: Some borrowed, some own.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `arc land`, Verify `robots.txt` work correctly on test deploy.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D210

docusaurus(meta): document `npx browserlist` result
Summary: As of 2024-06-08.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: Not really needed; use `npx browserlist` to verify
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D207

style: `npx prettier --write .`
Summary: And miscellaneous rule fix to make my life easier.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: build/serve docusaurus
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi

WKD: Yet another try
Summary: Well, actually prolly the first try, and need my own domain in key data, but that's incoming.
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: Try the `README` in the diff.
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi

npm: Install more npm packages + `.arclint` update
Summary: - `csslint` - `jshint` - `jsonlint`
Also edit some `.arclint` for ease of work
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `npm ci`
Reviewers: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O2 Coders, O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D205

npm: remove unnecessary `docusaurus/package-lock.json`
Summary: With `workspace`, package-lock data is managed @ rootdir's `package-lock.json`. Remove accordingly, per [StackOverflow.com](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/74906173/package-lock-json-in-npm-workspaces).
Signed-off-by: Yongmin Hong <revi@omglol.email>
Test Plan: `npm ci` should work as intended.
Reviewers: O1 revi & automations, revi
Reviewed By: O1 revi & automations, revi
Differential Revision: https://issuetracker.revi.xyz/D204
